article.name: mind-control
article.contents:
--- class: Psion name: Mind Control title: Mind Control school: Telepathy rank: 2 type: Control brief: Take control of a creature. compact: At-will, std, ranged, concentration; you controls ubject's body. Each round, they are allowed a Cha save to suppress your control; on success, they take no action; on failure, you control their actions. If they pass two saves in a row, the effect ends. While concentrating, your own body is motionless and cannot take actions. ---
# Mind Control
Despite the name, it's more like Body Control. You replace the subject's consciousness, and have full control of their body. You don't directly gain access to their knowledge and mental abilities (although, being in their mind, you probably have other ways to get it). They can contest you for control and attempt to eject you.
